label: 三綱
説明文: The top three monastic posts in temples. The top rank was the jōza, who was the most senior monk in the temple, and in charge of the monks. Next was the jishu, the temple master, who was in charge of many matters of administration and the temple itself. Thirdly was the tsuina, the temple administrator who was charged with administrative duties.[上坐、寺主、都維那]
